posts.title: 关于SpringBoot启动某Service实现类报错发现两个实例问题
posts.slug: 关于SpringBoot启动某Service实现类报错发现两个实例问题
posts.path: 2020/10/24/关于SpringBoot启动某Service实现类报错发现两个实例问题/
posts.text: ServiceImpl required a single bean, but 2 were found;

posts.title: 关于Spring组件未加人到容器报错问题
posts.slug: 关于Spring组件未加人到容器报错问题
posts.path: 2020/10/21/关于Spring组件未加人到容器报错问题/
posts.text: 123问题描述：The injection point has the following annotations:- @org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired(required=true)Action: 原因是自己在写项目时不小心把Spring的Service组件忘记加注解了，导致没有导入到spring容器中，而另一个类引用了该组件，启动时找不到，所以报错。 以后出现这种错误可以猜测到是Spring的某个@Autowired注解下的组件未导入到容器中。。 在此记录一下

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
